trans-unit.source: Provides pop-up or online Help for controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece ajuda de pop-up ou online para controlos.

trans-unit.source: Each instance of HelpProvider maintains a collection of references to controls associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Cada instância de HelpProvider mantém uma coleção de referências para controlos associados à mesma.

trans-unit.source: To associate a Help file with the HelpProvider, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para associar um ficheiro de ajuda a HelpProvider, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: You specify the type of Help provided by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A> method and providing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator> value for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Especifique o tipo de ajuda fornecida ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A>método e fornecer um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator>valor para o controlo especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A>

trans-unit.source: You provide the keyword or topic for the Help by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode fornecer a palavra-chave ou um tópico de ajuda ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>

trans-unit.source: To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm.
trans-unit.target: Para abrir a ajuda para um tópico específico, a palavra-chave deve ser transmitida no formato *topicName**.htm.

trans-unit.source: To associate a specific Help string with a control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para associar uma cadeia de ajuda específica de um controlo, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string that you associate with a control using this method is displayed in a pop-up window when the user presses the F1 key while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia que associa um controlo com este método é apresentada numa janela de pop-up quando o utilizador premir a tecla de F1 enquanto o controlo tem foco.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property has not been set, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method to provide the Help text.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>propriedade não foi definida, tem de utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>método para fornecer o texto de ajuda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you have set both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> and the Help string, Help based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> will take precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver definido ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>e a cadeia de ajuda, a ajuda com base no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>terá precedência.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: HelpProvider calls methods on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help> class to provide Help functionality.
trans-unit.target: HelpProvider chama os métodos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help>classe para fornecer a funcionalidade de ajuda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Once you have created an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> method, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A> method to associate your Help topics with a control.
trans-unit.target: Assim que tiver criado uma instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>classe, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>propriedade, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>método, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A>método para associar os tópicos de ajuda a um controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this object can provide its extender properties to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se este objeto pode fornecer as respetivas propriedades de extensão para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The object that the externder properties are provided to.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que as propriedades de externder são fornecidas para.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can provide its extender properties; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este objeto pode fornecer as respetivas propriedades extensão; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Help keyword for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a palavra-chave de ajuda para o controlo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> from which to retrieve the Help topic.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> para obter o tópico de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword associated with this control, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref> is currently configured to display the entire Help file or is configured to provide a Help string.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-chave de ajuda associada a este controlo ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref> está configurado para apresentar todo o ficheiro de ajuda ou está configurado para fornecer uma cadeia de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref> setting for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"> </xref> definição para o controlo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> from which to retrieve the Help navigator.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> para obter ajuda navegador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref> setting for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"> </xref> definição para o controlo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the contents of the pop-up Help window for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os conteúdos da janela de ajuda de pop-up para o controlo especificado.

trans-unit.source: To display this Help string at run time, the user presses the F1 key while the specified control has the input focus.
trans-unit.target: Para visualizar esta cadeia de ajuda em tempo de execução, o utilizador premir a tecla de F1 enquanto o controlo especificado tem o foco de entrada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> from which to retrieve the Help string.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> partir do qual obter a cadeia de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: The Help string associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de ajuda associada a este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified control's Help should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se ajuda o controlo especificado deve ser apresentadas.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method to associate a keyword or prompt with a specified control, calling this method automatically returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>método para associar uma palavra-chave ou uma linha de comandos a um controlo especificado, chamar este método automaticamente devolve `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override this behavior by passing `false` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir este comportamento transferindo `false` para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> for which Help will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> para o qual será apresentada ajuda.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Help will be displayed for the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se ajuda será apresentada para o controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the name of the Help file associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica o nome do ficheiro de ajuda associado a este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The file name retrieved by this method identifies the file that provides Help support for all the controls for which this object provides Help.
trans-unit.target: O nome de ficheiro obtido através deste método identifica o ficheiro que fornece suporte de ajuda para todos os controlos para o qual este objecto fornece ajuda.

trans-unit.source: This file name can designate either a compiled Help (.chm) file or a raw HTML file.
trans-unit.target: Este nome de ficheiro pode designar um ficheiro de ajuda (*.chm) compilado ou um ficheiro HTML não processado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the Help file.
trans-unit.target: O nome do ficheiro de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: This can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ter o formato C:\path\sample.chm ou /folder/file.htm.

trans-unit.source: Removes the Help associated with the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Remove a ajuda associada ao controlo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the designer.
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado pelo estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The control to remove Help from.
trans-unit.target: O controlo para remover a ajuda.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the keyword used to retrieve Help when the user invokes Help for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a palavra-chave utilizada para obter ajuda quando o utilizador invoca ajuda para o controlo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword provides the key information to retrieve the Help associated with this control from the Help file specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-chave da ajuda fornece as informações da chave para obter a ajuda associada a este controlo de ficheiro de ajuda especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm.
trans-unit.target: Para abrir a ajuda para um tópico específico, a palavra-chave deve ser transmitida no formato *topicName**.htm.

trans-unit.source: To clear the keyword, call the SetHelpKeyword method with a `keyword` value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: Para limpar a palavra-chave, chame o método de SetHelpKeyword com um `keyword` valor `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that specifies the control for which to set the Help topic.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> que especifica o controlo para o qual pretende definir o tópico de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword to associate with the control.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-chave do ajuda a associar o controlo.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Help command to use when retrieving Help from the Help file for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o comando de ajuda para utilizar durante a obtenção de ajuda do ficheiro de ajuda para o controlo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> for which to set the Help keyword.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> para o qual pretende definir a palavra-chave de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The value of navigator is not one of the values.
trans-unit.target: O valor de navigator não é um do valores.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Help string associated with the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a cadeia de ajuda associada ao controlo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Help string that you specify in the `helpString` parameter is displayed in a pop-up window when the user presses the F1 key while the specified control has focus.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de ajuda que especificou no `helpString` parâmetro é apresentado numa janela de pop-up quando o utilizador premir a tecla de F1 enquanto o controlo especificado tem foco.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> with which to associate the Help string.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> com a qual pretende associar a cadeia de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: The Help string associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de ajuda associada ao controlo.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether Help is displayed for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se a ajuda é apresentada para o controlo especificado.

trans-unit.source: If you previously called the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> for the control specified in the `ctl` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> automatically displays Help for that control.
trans-unit.target: Se anteriormente denominadas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>para o controlo especificado no `ctl` parâmetro, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>automaticamente apresenta a ajuda para esse controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To modify this behavior, call the SetShowHelp method, specifying `false` in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar este comportamento, chame o método SetShowHelp, especificando `false` no `value` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> for which Help is turned on or off.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> para que ajuda está ativada ou desativado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Help displays for the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>se mostra ajuda para o controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains supplemental data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto que contém dados suplementares sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém dados sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que representa o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a string that includes the type and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>.
trans-unit.target: O método ToString devolve uma cadeia que inclui o tipo e a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref>.
